result.reason: Connections are duplicated in the tree after editing the connection list, likely due to a double event subscription or double-load in the save/refresh cycle of ConnectionsService or the XML serializer.
result.approach: Audit event handler registration in ConnectionsService and the XML load path to ensure connections are not added twice (e.g., CollectionChanged fired during load + explicit AddRange after load); add guard or clear-before-load pattern.
